mapper.sql: member_id, member_name, wechat, wechat_img, wechat_name, balance, red_packet, cellphone, birth_time, city, rp_exchange_ratio, rp_trade_mark, rp_listing_ratio, createtime, member_rank,cash_money,rank_money
mapper.select:
select
from member_info
and member_rank = #{memberRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and wechat_name like "%" #{wechatName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and cellphone like "%" #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and rp_trade_mark like "%" #{rpTradeMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
order by createtime desc
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(0) from member_info
and member_rank = #{memberRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and wechat_name like "%" #{wechatName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and cellphone like "%" #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and rp_trade_mark like "%" #{rpTradeMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"

update member_info
rank_money = #{rankMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
